    Home Menu Password Change Profile Change Restaurants About
) } else { items = (

) } return (
{items}

); const mapStateToProps = ({ firebase }) => ({ loggedIn: firebase.auth.uid ? true : null, }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Toolbar)
